summary: Hey guys this is my first mod thats uploaded and created so please no bad comments plz
descriptionHtml:
for the weapons type on command "help human" or "help club". So get the weapon jump over water in-mid air press the command and type it in. After drag it out. this is how i got the weapon. there may be other ways to do so.
HOW TO GET THE WEAPON FOR UR FOLLOWER (WEAPON ONLY WORKS FOR FOLLOWER)
get the follower u want than hold down "E" and press take when that is active on the weapon
